titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY NON CURATIVE TREATMENT PATIENT BENEFIT INDICATOR - Description

div.p: An indication of whether the PATIENT benefited from the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy non-curative treatment.

Note: Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy non-curative treatment is for prolonging life and reducing symptoms. It is often given to PATIENTS with advanced cancer to make PATIENTS more comfortable towards the end of life.
